sense.def:
A seat
je predmet, na katerem lahko sedimo, na primer stol.

seg.quote: Roger sat down carefully, using the edge of the crate as a seat.
I rang the theatre to see if I could get seats for the show.

sense.def:
The seat of a chair
je tisti del stola, na katerem sedimo.

To seat oneself somewhere
pomeni, da nekam sedemo.

seg.quote: ‘Thank you,’ she said, seating herself on the sofa.
General Tomkins was seated behind his desk.

sense.def:
Kadar stavba ali vozilo
seats a particular number of people
, je v njem dovolj sedežev za določeno število ljudi.

To win a seat
pomeni, da je nekdo izvoljen v parlament in tako v njem dobi mesto zase ali za svojo stranko.

seg.quote: The Nationalists failed to win a single seat.

sense.def:
To take a back seat
pomeni dovoliti drugim, da imajo vso moč in odločajo o vsem.

cit.quote: umakniti se v ozadje, držati se v ozadju
